name: Regozijando van Leedvermaak
tagline: Retired computer scientist and practical mathematician.
body:
# Welcome to my website!
Hello visitor,

I am Regozijando van Leedvermaak, a retired computer scientist and practical mathematician born in Graz, Austria, now living in Warrnambool, Australia.

On this website, I will share some of my works and passions. Be sure to check back once I have added more content!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
